ErrorHandler - Interface in com.imperio
Implementations of this class handle errors and warnings which may occur within the Imperio library.
errorHandler - Variable in class com.imperio.ImperioApp
 
errorHandler - Variable in class com.imperio.ImperioAppSpec
 
ErrorHandlerException - Class in com.imperio
This ErrorHandler behaves the same as ErrorHandlerPrint, except that after logging error messages, it throws InternalImperioExceptions.
ErrorHandlerException() - Constructor for class com.imperio.ErrorHandlerException
 
ErrorHandlerExit - Class in com.imperio
This ErrorHandler behaves the same as ErrorHandlerPrint, except that after logging error messages, it terminates the program using the provided ErrorType.code.
ErrorHandlerExit() - Constructor for class com.imperio.ErrorHandlerExit
 
ErrorHandlerNull - Class in com.imperio
This ErrorHandler silently swallows all errors and warnings.
ErrorHandlerNull() - Constructor for class com.imperio.ErrorHandlerNull
 
ErrorHandlerPrint - Class in com.imperio
This ErrorHandler prints any errors to System.err and any warnings to System.out.
ErrorHandlerPrint() - Constructor for class com.imperio.ErrorHandlerPrint
 
ErrorType - Class in com.imperio
Instances of this class represent a category of errors that may occur.
